title: How can a team be so fucking bad?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
I always end up with total noob teams. Look at this game, we always had gold advantage. Still they lose cause of retardedness. Just look how many deaths my teammates have. 
I wish such people would get to lower elo autmatically. What a bad game. If they would have listened to my calls ONCE, we would have won easily. But they were just deaf or plain retarded. I hate this game. No, to be exactly, the game is good, the matchmaking is flawed. If you are a good player you so often get retarded teammates to compensate for your strength :(

http://matchhistory.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUW1/2237276244/37417418?tab=overview

replies.body: Hast Dich wohl ins falsche Forum verlaufen.
Stories from the Paulanergarden. Like we Deutschen would say.
